wikipedia_page.main: Archibald Campbell Elson Garrett (17 June 1919 – 10 April 1994) was a Scottish professional footballer who played in the Football League for Preston North End, Northampton Town and Birmingham City, and in the Scottish Football League for Heart of Midlothian. He played as a forward.
